body: Hello, Thanks you to correct the file. I still have an error I don't understand why:when I run the simulation it seems to work but then I have this error " **'numZones' is not defined** "   and there is no data from the HB-read EP result (screenshot joined). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/RjUGj58MiaGU-kmz2HXdGU9*IrYUIQ43zd-cy2Y9haF0d8RU*X36pBkV12FJh6wV48OvFmo9PAO2O5zh33MmHRuV*vdfduC8/Capturedcran2015010413.28.38.png)Is there a maximal surface of a zone we can work with without dividing it into smaller zones?
